website_summaries.verdict: Many people were positive about the arrival of the Nike Odyssey React. They welcomed this road shoe’s more budget-friendly price, the pretty design and the comfortable underfoot platform. Moreover, they were happy with the light build. On the other hand, some purchasers weren’t pleased with the cheap-looking upper while others lamented the tight toe box and flimsy outsole construction.
pros: Many runners appreciated the color schemes of the Nike Odyssey React
The lightweight nature of this running shoe allowed consumers an unencumbered experience on the roads
‘Comfortable’ was a word that was prominently used to describe this product
Most testers liked the React midsole’s capacity to cushion the foot responsibly
Several purchasers welcomed the energy-return that’s delivered by the midsole foam
The neoprene tongue was well-liked by many because it didn’t cause any irritation to the skin
The price was agreeable for a shoe that features relatively new technology, some people commented
A handful of testers liked the traction capacity of the rubber bottom, stating that it was efficient
The addition of more rubber in the critical sections of the outsole was famously praised by users and reviewers alike
Several reviewers liked that this model functioned well as a performance companion and as a casual choice of apparel
cons: A consumer claimed that the Odyssey React’s upper unit crinkled easily, causing its material to look and feel cheap
The narrow toe-box turned off those who had wide feet
The outsole rubber wore off quickly when used on treadmills, a few testers observed
Some people lamented the more prominent profile of this model, even directly comparing it to its sibling, the Epic React model

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great!. Nike did a great job on this one. Feels much like the Epic React but at a less cost. I have been looking for something that was a soft cushion feeling . Tried many but this one is the one. I went a half size up for more room and it fits perfect. And Amazon got it to me in the quick two day delivery. Thanks to Nike and Amazon for getting me in a shoe that really does what it should and what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but narrower than expected
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, my teenage son loved these shoes. Unfortunately, he struggled to get them on his feet because the midfoot was narrower than expected. He said they felt pretty good once they were on and he really liked the look of them as well as the loop in the back. However, he decided he didn't want to struggle every time he put his shoes on so he went with the Nike Legend React since they were so similar but easier to slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wilms

customer_reviews.title: If your foot is very wide you will not be able to wear this model Nike.
customer_reviews.text: Design style and color of the shoe is unique and special. The react sole has a very soft feeling like Adidas Boost material. Shoe runs a bit narrow. Lots of durable tread rubber showing on outsole. These shoes are very light weight, feels like wearing slippers. Was glad the tongue was not fully integrated into the shoe-sock style so a higher arch can fit without too much instep pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow in the midfoot
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations with these sneakers, but they have been contrary, narrow in the midfoot, and the midsole does not feel as comfortable as the reviews say.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Really, and I mean REALLY, Tight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes together with another NIKE pair of running shoes. I bought both the same size and to my surprize, the other pair fit great but this pair are super tight on my feet. To the point that I think if I keep them on they might explode! They look good but the size is a real disappointment. Not comfortable at all.. If your feet look like hotdogs, these are probably for you.
customer_reviews.author: Noor Ahmad Shinwari

customer_reviews.title: light like a slipper
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace the Nike Lunarglides, which I really liked. I needed a walking shoe, not running. These are good for driveway workouts like jump rope, jumping jacks, box jumps, etc. I do not like these for walking. They are extremely light and very snug around the mid foot. They feel great wearing around the house. Runners may like these for distance. But I would rather have the lunar glides back. The Odyssey React is a slipper.
customer_reviews.author: tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit tight. Run smaller than size.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased several Nike shoes before all the same size. Got these and they seemed to fit ok, but wearing them all day realized they were too small and hurt the back of my heals. Had to stop wearing these shoes so wasted my money on them. So sad since they look really nice and have good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Rene De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: squishy but nice for pavement
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my last 5 pairs of 12B asics, the 12.5 nike adds slight room in toe box but in a good way. I like the bootie, low cut, light weight, lacing. The bulk of sole is very soft but with a pretty hard wear surface so hope durability is good, even though they feel squishier. I would not recommend these for anything technical as it is pretty easy to roll to either side.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: More cheap Nike garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on 12/30/2019. I've been wearing them to work maybe 3x per week (not every day). The outer sole is already beginning to peel away from the base sole. The removable insoles are cheap, flimsy crap. At the same price point you CANNOT compare these cheaply made Nike with the quality of Asics or Brooks, you can't . . . period.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Not for the wide-footed :(
customer_reviews.text: The size itself is true to size, but these shoes run pretty narrow. They are super comfy and obviously beautiful but in the end we have to return them because they are not wide enough. If you feel like you have wide feet or have historically needed a wide size, this style is probably not the shoe for you. Super bummer because they’re such nice shoes otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: genericpenname

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great look and color. I really liked this shoe for my son because it's not your normal sneaker color, yet doesn't stand out. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite pair of nikes. This is my second pair. First one had TONS of miles on them. Lasted for 2 years and still looked good, just wore out internally. Ordered the exact same pair because they go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: A good choice for running.
customer_reviews.text: I recently recently ran 4 miles in the Nike Odyssey to break them in. I have flat feet and the shoes offered a lot of support. The Nike odyssey feels a little tighter than most shoes I have run in but over all they offer good support.
customer_reviews.author: etheromis

customer_reviews.title: Really responsive
customer_reviews.text: It fits a tad closer than i expected but apart from that i think this shoe is fantastic. I jogged in them for a short distance the response from the reactive cushion is amazing. Great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of tightness.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is way too tight. I have another Nike shoe in white made of the same material that I love wearing. Very comfortable for walking, but they get dirty so easily. Bought these to help with that. I’ve never had a corn before. I had to google what was wrong with my toe. Took me a month to recover and the skin is just now healing. Beware!! I have a stretcher in the shoe since then so I will try to wear them one more time or they go to donation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes!! Make sure to get a 1/2 size up as they do run small.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton1985

customer_reviews.title: Is React life?
customer_reviews.text: Move over Boost. Cushioned and light. Has more support than the Epic React, but all the cushion. Holds you tight and keeps upt the cushion for the pushin.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wish they came in a wide option. Other than that they are great shoes
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for half marathons and marathons!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the comfort of these shoes. The only issue I had is that I have high arches and the arches in these shoes doesn’t really support mine, but not too many shoes do - overall I’m satisfied. I actually love them especially the feedback you get from the react outer soles. Great for half marathons and marathons.
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Sent these to our twelve year old nephew who suddenly grew adult size feet. He loves the style and comfort, and only takes them off for bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and small
customer_reviews.text: I bought one size up from my normal size and the length is ok. The width is very narrow for the bigger size. Shoe support is good.
customer_reviews.author: Robo

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT AND COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are extremely lightweight and are very flexible. Perfect for running/walking and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Mesh rips easy. Was ripping by 2nd day
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and comfort but the mesh had hole in it by the second day with normal wear. For the price I paid, I am greatly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size is narrow!
customer_reviews.text: No way are these a running shoe. I use them for officiating high school sports. My feet are sore afterwards due to the fit of the shoe. They are narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excelent Shoes! The size of this model It’s a little bigger... awesome option! I’m happy 🙋🏻‍♂️🎉
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Flores

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were previously worn. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I received have been worn. There is obvious dirt, one of the shoes was unlaced and missing the paper insert. Also a silver marker mark on the outsole
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe  but
customer_reviews.text: This is my forth pair as you can see I really like the way they feel, here is the but I use them 4 or 5 days a week for at least 2 or 3 hours at a time and they only last 3 months so they end up being the most expensive shoes that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Replaced the exact pair I've worn for the past year.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 63-year-old runner who does 400-500 miles a year. Need a little more cushioning these days and I've found the Odyssey React to be the shoe. Was happy to see this slightly updated model had the same performance as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Blazek (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes but unfortunately had to send them back as they were much too narrow for my feet .
customer_reviews.author: flh440

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable Nike to date!
customer_reviews.text: As with all good things these are unfortunately discontinued by Nike. Buy them if you can and when you can - the most comfortable and supportive sneakers to date!!!
customer_reviews.author: jerrymchill

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: I think they’re a good sneaker. They’re not as comfortable as I thought they’d be but, for $60 they’re comfortable enough. I bought them because I like the way they look and they’re not a sneaker everyone wears. I’d recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely enjoys these sneakers. He wears them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The color on the back side was diferente in the picture, there is a line on the back side shown as light blue and mine is pink, I do not know why, so bad!
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Quiros

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Odyssey React. I use them for boot camp and running. So comfy on my troublesome feet. Hope they never stop making the original React shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Caused a running set back
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high mileage shoe. Also, not much arch support. Caused plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a small business who has been great. Arrived on time and also had amazing prices. Very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect, and are one of the most comfortable shoes I have purchased. I have flat feet so the cushion of these shoes are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: To tight around the out side not very cushioning for working or exercise
customer_reviews.author: jerry brooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: The best running shoes I’ve ever had, I’d like to re buy them but I can’t seem to find them again although, I think the price is a bit hefty. Still, I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael V

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: To expensive for the shoe I buy a lot of nine shoes to. The color was perfect just wrong size
customer_reviews.author: cynthia mcguigan

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and size
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe! Unfortunately it was the wrong color and size. If it had been the right size I would have kept it anyway. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Upgrading

customer_reviews.title: Good for running
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and comfortable for long running. Only for roads or the gym.
customer_reviews.author: yonish

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The sole is way too hard for this shoe compared to the same exact shoe purchased in store one year ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very supportive and comfortable for long runs. Ran a 10k two weeks ago. Felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Maestas

customer_reviews.title: By far the best..
customer_reviews.text: This the 2nd pair I've bought for my son, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes is good but it is not fit with me
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except the shoes is too fit for my wide foot. I am really sorry to say that I have to return it because the design is not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable at all. Thought I had to break it in, but wore it for 2 weeks straight and no change at all.
customer_reviews.author: Suave

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I’m running on clouds
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of running shoes, but these are by far the best I’ve had. I look forward to every time I put these on.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Love Reacts
customer_reviews.text: I love all Nike react products. They are comfortable, great for running in and just good for everything. If your looking for a great shoe. This is a great shoe 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Little narrow
customer_reviews.text: If your shoe size is a 9 in a half you would need a 10. Go up a half a size 8 to a 8.5 ok.
customer_reviews.author: tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying the same shoe. Favorite shoe Nike has
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! This is the second time we buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Reorder shoe already own 2 pair
customer_reviews.text: Work requires black shoe so reorder - fit as expected. Delivery was fast
customer_reviews.author: dalber

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were true to size, fire perfectly, and fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buy best shoe I’ve ever purchased at a price this great
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hylton

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Odyssey React Competition Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Running Shoes Man Nike NIKE ODYSSEY REACT AO9819-008
feature_bullets: A premium Jacquard fabric upper has a circular knit construction that is lightweight and breathable
Neoprene bootie provides a soft, sock-like feel
Nike React cushioning smooths out your ride with lightweight responsiveness
Geometric, athlete-informed outsole allows for smooth transitions
